quote: The Lord is my shepherd. I shall not want for nothing. He makes me lie down in the green pastures. He greases up my head with oil. He gives me kung-fu in the face of my enemies. Amen
quote_letters: THE LORD IS MY SHEPHERD I SHALL NOT WANT FOR NOTHING HE MAKES ME LIE DOWN IN THE GREEN PASTURES HE GREASES UP MY HEAD WITH OIL HE GIVES ME KUNG-FU IN THE FACE OF MY ENEMIES AMEN
